title: Antiepileptic and anti-inflammatory effects of Lippia multiflora moldenke (Verbenaceae) in mice model of chronic temporal lobe epilepsy induced by pilocarpine
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Joseph Ngaibi, Bigued, Antoine Kavaye Kandeda, Yvette Nguezeye, Tchang Alkali Wangbara, Lamido Gaoudji, Germain Sotoing Taiwe, Elisabeth Ngo Bum
